Package de.berlios.jmds.server

Class Summary
FindObject This object list all objects on server and save this configuration on a xml file
RightsManager Manage the rigths on server to check access of server object
SCManager Manage the service context to check if code and decode are true and if the client can talk with server
ServerInter Allow to intercept message send or receive by server.
ServerORBInitializer Initializer witch allow to attach a interceptor on server
